LanguageData.Pemmican.label: pemmikan
LanguageData.Pemmican.description: Lav pemmican, en præserveret kombination af kød og planteføde der ikke bliver dårligt i lang tid. Egner sig godt til, når man vil rejse.
LanguageData.PassiveCooler.label: passive køler
LanguageData.PassiveCooler.description: Lav passive kølere, en måde at nedkøle indendørsområder uden elektricitet.
LanguageData.Devilstrand.label: djævletråd
LanguageData.Devilstrand.description: Gør, at kolonister kan plante djævletråd, en langsomt voksende svamp der afgiver værdifulde fibre.
LanguageData.Brewing.label: Bryggeri
LanguageData.Brewing.description: Gør at du kan bygge et bryggeri til at transformere humle til lækker, smagfuld øl.
LanguageData.CarpetMaking.label: tæppevævning
LanguageData.CarpetMaking.description: Gør, at dine kolonister kan bygge tæpper og forøge kvaliteten af deres miljø.
LanguageData.Smithing.label: smedning
LanguageData.Smithing.description: Byg smedjer til at lave våben og værktøjer af metal.
LanguageData.Stonecutting.label: stenhugning
LanguageData.Stonecutting.description: Byg stenhuggerborde, der giver mulighed for at forvandle stenklumper til stenblokke, som kan bruges til konstruktion.
LanguageData.ComplexClothing.label: kompleks beklædning
LanguageData.ComplexClothing.description: Sy kompliceret beklædning som bukser, frakker og cowboyhatte
LanguageData.DrugProduction.label: medicinproduktion
LanguageData.DrugProduction.description: Det grundlæggende af medicin forberedelse og syntese. Gør, at du kan bygge medicinbord. Der behøves mere forskning for at lave specifik medicin.
LanguageData.Electricity.label: elektricitet
LanguageData.Electricity.description: Generer og udnyt elektricitet til at lave mad eller andre simple opgaver.

LanguageData.PsychoidBrewing.label: psychoid brewing
LanguageData.PsychoidBrewing.description: Prepare psychoid leaves into a mildly euphoria-inducing and addictive tea at the campfire or cooking stove.
LanguageData.TreeSowing.label: tree sowing
LanguageData.TreeSowing.description: Sow the local biome's natural trees in your fields.
LanguageData.Brewing.label: ølbrygning
LanguageData.Brewing.description: Byg et bryggeri og ------------ Build a brewery and fermenting vats to transform hops into tasty, tasty beer.
LanguageData.ComplexFurniture.label: komplekse møbler
LanguageData.ComplexFurniture.description: Byg komplekse møbler som senge, borde, spiseborde, spisestole, lænestole, kommoder, værktøjsskabe, billardborde, pokerborde, udluftningsskakte, sarkofager og meget mere.
LanguageData.PassiveCooler.label: passive cooler
LanguageData.PassiveCooler.description: Make passive coolers, to cool indoor spaces without using electricity.
LanguageData.Stonecutting.label: stonecutting
LanguageData.Stonecutting.description: Cut rock chunks into stone blocks for use in construction. Build beautiful stone tile floors or ugly concrete walkways.
LanguageData.ComplexClothing.label: complex clothing
LanguageData.ComplexClothing.description: Tailor complicated garments like pants, dusters, and cowboy hats.
LanguageData.DrugProduction.label: drug production
LanguageData.DrugProduction.description: Build a drug lab for basic drug synthesis. Further research is required to make specific drugs.
LanguageData.Cocoa.label: kakao
LanguageData.Cocoa.description: Sow cocoa trees to create your own delicious chocolate. Eating chocolate fulfills the need for recreation, and it's valuable on the market too.
LanguageData.Devilstrand.label: devilstrand
LanguageData.Devilstrand.description: Plant devilstrand, a slow-growing mushroom that yields an exceptionally tough, heat-resistant plant fiber.
LanguageData.CarpetMaking.label: carpet making
LanguageData.Pemmican.label: pemmican
LanguageData.Pemmican.description: Make pemmican, a preserved mixture of meat and plant matter that doesn't go bad for a long time. Great for traveling.
LanguageData.Smithing.label: smithing
LanguageData.Smithing.description: Build smithies for crafting metal weapons like knives, gladii, and maces. Work metal into clean, beautiful floor tiles.
LanguageData.RecurveBow.label: recurve bow
LanguageData.RecurveBow.description: Build the recurve bow, an effective and inexpensive ranged weapon.
LanguageData.PsychiteRefining.label: psychite refining
LanguageData.PsychiteRefining.description: Refine psychoid leaves into flake and yayo, different forms of the euphoric psychite drug.
LanguageData.WakeUpProduction.label: wake-up production
LanguageData.WakeUpProduction.description: Synthesize wake-up, a work performance-enhancing drug which replaces the need for sleep.
LanguageData.GoJuiceProduction.label: go-juice production
LanguageData.GoJuiceProduction.description: Produce go-juice, a synthetic combat-performance-enhancing drug which improves shooting, melee, and movement ability, and dulls pain.
LanguageData.PenoxycylineProduction.label: penoxycyline production
LanguageData.PenoxycylineProduction.description: Produce penoxycline, a disease prevention drug which blocks plague, malaria, and more before they start.
LanguageData.LongBlades.label: long blades
LanguageData.PlateArmor.label: plate armor
LanguageData.PlateArmor.description: Smith suits of plate armor from metal or wood. This heavy armor noticeably slows movement, but protects very effectively.
LanguageData.Greatbow.label: greatbow
LanguageData.Greatbow.description: Craft greatbows for killing enemies at great range.
